yasalūnaka ʿani al-anfāli quli al-anfālu lillahi wal-rasūli fa-ittaqū al-laha wa-aṣliḥū dhāta baynikum wa-aṭīʿū al-laha warasūlahu in kuntum mu'minīna
innamā al-mu'minūna alladhīna idhā dhukira al-lahu wajilat qulūbuhum wa-idhā tuliyat ʿalayhim āyātuhu zādathum īmānan waʿalā rabbihim yatawakkalūna
alladhīna yuqīmūna al-ṣalata wamimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūna
ulāika humu al-mu'minūna ḥaqqan lahum darajātun ʿinda rabbihim wamaghfiratun wariz'qun karīmun
kamā akhrajaka rabbuka min baytika bil-ḥaqi wa-inna farīqan mina al-mu'minīna lakārihūna
yujādilūnaka fī al-ḥaqi baʿdamā tabayyana ka-annamā yusāqūna ilā al-mawti wahum yanẓurūna
wa-idh yaʿidukumu al-lahu iḥ'dā al-ṭāifatayni annahā lakum watawaddūna anna ghayra dhāti al-shawkati takūnu lakum wayurīdu al-lahu an yuḥiqqa al-ḥaqa bikalimātihi wayaqṭaʿa dābira al-kāfirīna
liyuḥiqqa al-ḥaqa wayub'ṭila al-bāṭila walaw kariha al-muj'rimūna
idh tastaghīthūna rabbakum fa-is'tajāba lakum annī mumiddukum bi-alfin mina al-malāikati mur'difīna
wamā jaʿalahu al-lahu illā bush'rā walitaṭma-inna bihi qulūbukum wamā al-naṣru illā min ʿindi al-lahi inna al-laha ʿazīzun ḥakīmun
idh yughashīkumu al-nuʿāsa amanatan min'hu wayunazzilu ʿalaykum mina al-samāi māan liyuṭahhirakum bihi wayudh'hiba ʿankum rij'za al-shayṭāni waliyarbiṭa ʿalā qulūbikum wayuthabbita bihi al-aqdāma
idh yūḥī rabbuka ilā al-malāikati annī maʿakum fathabbitū alladhīna āmanū sa-ul'qī fī qulūbi alladhīna kafarū al-ruʿ'ba fa-iḍ'ribū fawqa al-aʿnāqi wa-iḍ'ribū min'hum kulla banānin
dhālika bi-annahum shāqqū al-laha warasūlahu waman yushāqiqi al-laha warasūlahu fa-inna al-laha shadīdu al-ʿiqābi
dhālikum fadhūqūhu wa-anna lil'kāfirīna ʿadhāba al-nāri
yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū idhā laqītumu alladhīna kafarū zaḥfan falā tuwallūhumu al-adbāra
waman yuwallihim yawma-idhin duburahu illā mutaḥarrifan liqitālin aw mutaḥayyizan ilā fi-atin faqad bāa bighaḍabin mina al-lahi wamawāhu jahannamu wabi'sa al-maṣīru
falam taqtulūhum walākinna al-laha qatalahum wamā ramayta idh ramayta walākinna al-laha ramā waliyub'liya al-mu'minīna min'hu balāan ḥasanan inna al-laha samīʿun ʿalīmun
dhālikum wa-anna al-laha mūhinu kaydi al-kāfirīna
in tastaftiḥū faqad jāakumu al-fatḥu wa-in tantahū fahuwa khayrun lakum wa-in taʿūdū naʿud walan tugh'niya ʿankum fi-atukum shayan walaw kathurat wa-anna al-laha maʿa al-mu'minīna
yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū aṭīʿū al-laha warasūlahu walā tawallaw ʿanhu wa-antum tasmaʿūna
walā takūnū ka-alladhīna qālū samiʿ'nā wahum lā yasmaʿūna
inna sharra al-dawābi ʿinda al-lahi al-ṣumu al-buk'mu alladhīna lā yaʿqilūna
walaw ʿalima al-lahu fīhim khayran la-asmaʿahum walaw asmaʿahum latawallaw wahum muʿ'riḍūna
yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū is'tajībū lillahi walilrrasūli idhā daʿākum limā yuḥ'yīkum wa-iʿ'lamū anna al-laha yaḥūlu bayna al-mari waqalbihi wa-annahu ilayhi tuḥ'sharūna
wa-ittaqū fit'natan lā tuṣībanna alladhīna ẓalamū minkum khāṣṣatan wa-iʿ'lamū anna al-laha shadīdu al-ʿiqābi
wa-udh'kurū idh antum qalīlun mus'taḍʿafūna fī al-arḍi takhāfūna an yatakhaṭṭafakumu al-nāsu faāwākum wa-ayyadakum binaṣrihi warazaqakum mina al-ṭayibāti laʿallakum tashkurūna
yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū lā takhūnū al-laha wal-rasūla watakhūnū amānātikum wa-antum taʿlamūna
wa-iʿ'lamū annamā amwālukum wa-awlādukum fit'natun wa-anna al-laha ʿindahu ajrun ʿaẓīmun
yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū in tattaqū al-laha yajʿal lakum fur'qānan wayukaffir ʿankum sayyiātikum wayaghfir lakum wal-lahu dhū al-faḍli al-ʿaẓīmi
wa-idh yamkuru bika alladhīna kafarū liyuth'bitūka aw yaqtulūka aw yukh'rijūka wayamkurūna wayamkuru al-lahu wal-lahu khayru al-mākirīna
wa-idhā tut'lā ʿalayhim āyātunā qālū qad samiʿ'nā law nashāu laqul'nā mith'la hādhā in hādhā illā asāṭīru al-awalīna
wa-idh qālū al-lahuma in kāna hādhā huwa al-ḥaqa min ʿindika fa-amṭir ʿalaynā ḥijāratan mina al-samāi awi i'tinā biʿadhābin alīmin
wamā kāna al-lahu liyuʿadhibahum wa-anta fīhim wamā kāna al-lahu muʿadhibahum wahum yastaghfirūna
wamā lahum allā yuʿadhibahumu al-lahu wahum yaṣuddūna ʿani al-masjidi al-ḥarāmi wamā kānū awliyāahu in awliyāuhu illā al-mutaqūna walākinna aktharahum lā yaʿlamūna
wamā kāna ṣalātuhum ʿinda al-bayti illā mukāan wataṣdiyatan fadhūqū al-ʿadhāba bimā kuntum takfurūna
inna alladhīna kafarū yunfiqūna amwālahum liyaṣuddū ʿan sabīli al-lahi fasayunfiqūnahā thumma takūnu ʿalayhim ḥasratan thumma yugh'labūna wa-alladhīna kafarū ilā jahannama yuḥ'sharūna
liyamīza al-lahu al-khabītha mina al-ṭayibi wayajʿala al-khabītha baʿḍahu ʿalā baʿḍin fayarkumahu jamīʿan fayajʿalahu fī jahannama ulāika humu al-khāsirūna
qul lilladhīna kafarū in yantahū yugh'far lahum mā qad salafa wa-in yaʿūdū faqad maḍat sunnatu al-awalīna
waqātilūhum ḥattā lā takūna fit'natun wayakūna al-dīnu kulluhu lillahi fa-ini intahaw fa-inna al-laha bimā yaʿmalūna baṣīrun
wa-in tawallaw fa-iʿ'lamū anna al-laha mawlākum niʿ'ma al-mawlā waniʿ'ma al-naṣīru

wa-iʿ'lamū annamā ghanim'tum min shayin fa-anna lillahi khumusahu walilrrasūli walidhī al-qur'bā wal-yatāmā wal-masākīni wa-ib'ni al-sabīli in kuntum āmantum bil-lahi wamā anzalnā ʿalā ʿabdinā yawma al-fur'qāni yawma al-taqā al-jamʿāni wal-lahu ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun

idh antum bil-ʿud'wati al-dun'yā wahum bil-ʿud'wati al-quṣ'wā wal-rakbu asfala minkum walaw tawāʿadttum la-ikh'talaftum fī al-mīʿādi walākin liyaqḍiya al-lahu amran kāna mafʿūlan liyahlika man halaka ʿan bayyinatin wayaḥyā man ḥayya ʿan bayyinatin wa-inna al-laha lasamīʿun ʿalīmun
idh yurīkahumu al-lahu fī manāmika qalīlan walaw arākahum kathīran lafashil'tum walatanāzaʿtum fī al-amri walākinna al-laha sallama innahu ʿalīmun bidhāti al-ṣudūri
wa-idh yurīkumūhum idhi al-taqaytum fī aʿyunikum qalīlan wayuqallilukum fī aʿyunihim liyaqḍiya al-lahu amran kāna mafʿūlan wa-ilā al-lahi tur'jaʿu al-umūru
yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū idhā laqītum fi-atan fa-uth'butū wa-udh'kurū al-laha kathīran laʿallakum tuf'liḥūna
wa-aṭīʿū al-laha warasūlahu walā tanāzaʿū fatafshalū watadhhaba rīḥukum wa-iṣ'birū inna al-laha maʿa al-ṣābirīna
walā takūnū ka-alladhīna kharajū min diyārihim baṭaran wariāa al-nāsi wayaṣuddūna ʿan sabīli al-lahi wal-lahu bimā yaʿmalūna muḥīṭun

wa-idh zayyana lahumu al-shayṭānu aʿmālahum waqāla lā ghāliba lakumu al-yawma mina al-nāsi wa-innī jārun lakum falammā tarāati al-fi-atāni nakaṣa ʿalā ʿaqibayhi waqāla innī barīon minkum innī arā mā lā tarawna innī akhāfu al-laha wal-lahu shadīdu al-ʿiqābi
idh yaqūlu al-munāfiqūna wa-alladhīna fī qulūbihim maraḍun gharra hāulāi dīnuhum waman yatawakkal ʿalā al-lahi fa-inna al-laha ʿazīzun ḥakīmun
walaw tarā idh yatawaffā alladhīna kafarū al-malāikatu yaḍribūna wujūhahum wa-adbārahum wadhūqū ʿadhāba al-ḥarīqi
dhālika bimā qaddamat aydīkum wa-anna al-laha laysa biẓallāmin lil'ʿabīdi
kadabi āli fir'ʿawna wa-alladhīna min qablihim kafarū biāyāti al-lahi fa-akhadhahumu al-lahu bidhunūbihim inna al-laha qawiyyun shadīdu al-ʿiqābi
dhālika bi-anna al-laha lam yaku mughayyiran niʿ'matan anʿamahā ʿalā qawmin ḥattā yughayyirū mā bi-anfusihim wa-anna al-laha samīʿun ʿalīmun
kadabi āli fir'ʿawna wa-alladhīna min qablihim kadhabū biāyāti rabbihim fa-ahlaknāhum bidhunūbihim wa-aghraqnā āla fir'ʿawna wakullun kānū ẓālimīna
inna sharra al-dawābi ʿinda al-lahi alladhīna kafarū fahum lā yu'minūna
alladhīna ʿāhadtta min'hum thumma yanquḍūna ʿahdahum fī kulli marratin wahum lā yattaqūna
fa-immā tathqafannahum fī al-ḥarbi fasharrid bihim man khalfahum laʿallahum yadhakkarūna
wa-immā takhāfanna min qawmin khiyānatan fa-inbidh ilayhim ʿalā sawāin inna al-laha lā yuḥibbu al-khāinīna
walā yaḥsabanna alladhīna kafarū sabaqū innahum lā yuʿ'jizūna

wa-aʿiddū lahum mā is'taṭaʿtum min quwwatin wamin ribāṭi al-khayli tur'hibūna bihi ʿaduwwa al-lahi waʿaduwwakum waākharīna min dūnihim lā taʿlamūnahumu al-lahu yaʿlamuhum wamā tunfiqū min shayin fī sabīli al-lahi yuwaffa ilaykum wa-antum lā tuẓ'lamūna
wa-in janaḥū lilssalmi fa-ij'naḥ lahā watawakkal ʿalā al-lahi innahu huwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
wa-in yurīdū an yakhdaʿūka fa-inna ḥasbaka al-lahu huwa alladhī ayyadaka binaṣrihi wabil-mu'minīna
wa-allafa bayna qulūbihim law anfaqta mā fī al-arḍi jamīʿan mā allafta bayna qulūbihim walākinna al-laha allafa baynahum innahu ʿazīzun ḥakīmun
yāayyuhā al-nabiyu ḥasbuka al-lahu wamani ittabaʿaka mina al-mu'minīna

yāayyuhā al-nabiyu ḥarriḍi al-mu'minīna ʿalā al-qitāli in yakun minkum ʿish'rūna ṣābirūna yaghlibū mi-atayni wa-in yakun minkum mi-atun yaghlibū alfan mina alladhīna kafarū bi-annahum qawmun lā yafqahūna
al-āna khaffafa al-lahu ʿankum waʿalima anna fīkum ḍaʿfan fa-in yakun minkum mi-atun ṣābiratun yaghlibū mi-atayni wa-in yakun minkum alfun yaghlibū alfayni bi-idh'ni al-lahi wal-lahu maʿa al-ṣābirīna
mā kāna linabiyyin an yakūna lahu asrā ḥattā yuth'khina fī al-arḍi turīdūna ʿaraḍa al-dun'yā wal-lahu yurīdu al-ākhirata wal-lahu ʿazīzun ḥakīmun
lawlā kitābun mina al-lahi sabaqa lamassakum fīmā akhadhtum ʿadhābun ʿaẓīmun
fakulū mimmā ghanim'tum ḥalālan ṭayyiban wa-ittaqū al-laha inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
yāayyuhā al-nabiyu qul liman fī aydīkum mina al-asrā in yaʿlami al-lahu fī qulūbikum khayran yu'tikum khayran mimmā ukhidha minkum wayaghfir lakum wal-lahu ghafūrun raḥīmun
wa-in yurīdū khiyānataka faqad khānū al-laha min qablu fa-amkana min'hum wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun

inna alladhīna āmanū wahājarū wajāhadū bi-amwālihim wa-anfusihim fī sabīli al-lahi wa-alladhīna āwaw wanaṣarū ulāika baʿḍuhum awliyāu baʿḍin wa-alladhīna āmanū walam yuhājirū mā lakum min walāyatihim min shayin ḥattā yuhājirū wa-ini is'tanṣarūkum fī al-dīni faʿalaykumu al-naṣru illā ʿalā qawmin baynakum wabaynahum mīthāqun wal-lahu bimā taʿmalūna baṣīrun
wa-alladhīna kafarū baʿḍuhum awliyāu baʿḍin illā tafʿalūhu takun fit'natun fī al-arḍi wafasādun kabīrun
wa-alladhīna āmanū wahājarū wajāhadū fī sabīli al-lahi wa-alladhīna āwaw wanaṣarū ulāika humu al-mu'minūna ḥaqqan lahum maghfiratun wariz'qun karīmun
wa-alladhīna āmanū min baʿdu wahājarū wajāhadū maʿakum fa-ulāika minkum wa-ulū al-arḥāmi baʿḍuhum awlā bibaʿḍin fī kitābi al-lahi inna al-laha bikulli shayin ʿalīmun
